import { faBed, faCalendarDays, faCar, faPerson, faPlane, faTaxi } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons" import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome" import "./header.css" import { DateRange } from 'react-date-range'; import { useState } from "react"; import 'react-date-range/dist/styles.css'; // main css file import 'react-date-range/dist/theme/default.css'; // theme css file import {format} from "date-fns" export const Header = ({type}) => { const [openDate, setOpenDate] = useState(false) const [date, setDate] = useState([ { startDate: new Date(), endDate: new Date(), key: 'selection' } ]); const [openOptions, setOpenOptions] = useState(false); const [options,setOptions] = useState({ adult:1, children:0, room:1, }); const handleOption = (name, operation) => { setOptions((prev) => { return { ...prev, [name]: operation === "i" ? options[name] + 1 : options[name] - 1, }; }); }; const handleSearch = ()=>{ }; return (
Stays

{ type !=="list" && <>

A lifetime of discounts? It's genius

setOpenDate(!openDate)} className="headerSearchText">{`${format(date[0].startDate, "MM/dd/yyyy")} to ${format(date[0].endDate, "MM/dd/yyyy")}`} {openDate && setDate([item.selection])} moveRangeOnFirstSelection={false} ranges={date} className="date" />}
setOpenOptions(!openOptions)} className="headerSearchText">{`${options.adult} adult . ${options.children} children . ${options.room} room`} {openOptions &&
Adult

}
}
) } export default Header
